verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> heard הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when king חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <S%H7167><s%> [it] that he rent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֑יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וַיִּתְכַּ֣ס <S%H3680><s%> and covered בַּשָּׂ֔ק <S%H8242><s%> himself with sackcloth וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and went בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <S%H7971><s%> And he sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶלְיָקִ֨ים <S%H471><s%> Eliakim אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was over הַבַּ֜יִת <S%H1004><s%> which [was] over the household וְשֶׁבְנָ֣א <S%H7644><s%> and Shebna הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> and the elders הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests מִתְכַּסִּ֖ים <S%H3680><s%> covered בַּשַּׂקִּ֑ים <S%H8242><s%> with sackcloth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְשַֽׁעְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3470><s%> to Isaiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמֽוֹץ׃ <S%H531><s%> of Amoz

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> This day צָרָ֧ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble וְתוֹכֵחָ֛ה <S%H8433><s%> and of rebuke וּנְאָצָ֖ה <S%H5007><s%> and blasphemy הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [is] a day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> This כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come בָנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> for the children עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מַשְׁבֵּ֔ר <S%H4866><s%> to the birth וְכֹ֥חַ <S%H3581><s%> and [there is] not strength אַ֖יִן <S%H369><s%> and there לְלֵדָֽה׃ <S%H3205><s%> to bring forth

אוּלַ֡י <S%H194><s%> It may be יִשְׁמַע֩ <S%H8085><s%> will hear יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> all the words רַב־ שָׁקֵ֗ה <S%H7262><s%> of Rabshakeh אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom שְׁלָח֨וֹ <S%H7971><s%> hath sent מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> whom the king אַשּׁ֤וּר ׀ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֲדֹנָיו֙ <S%H113><s%> his master לְחָרֵף֙ <S%H2778><s%> to reproach אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God חַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> the living וְהוֹכִ֙יחַ֙ <S%H3198><s%> and will reprove בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> hath heard יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְנָשָׂ֣אתָ <S%H5375><s%> wherefore lift up תְפִלָּ֔ה <S%H8605><s%> [thy] prayer בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> for הַשְּׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> for the remnant הַנִּמְצָאָֽה׃ <S%H4672><s%> that are left
וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> came עַבְדֵ֛י <S%H5650><s%> So the servants הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְשַֽׁעַיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H3470><s%> to Isaiah

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶם֙ יְשַֽׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> And Isaiah כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמְר֖וּן <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹֽנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H113><s%> to your master כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> of הַדְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> which thou hast heard אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which גִּדְּפ֛וּ <S%H1442><s%> have blasphemed נַעֲרֵ֥י <S%H5288><s%> with which the servants מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֹתִֽי׃ <S%H853><s%>

הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> Behold I will send בּוֹ֙ ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> a blast וְשָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> upon him and he shall hear שְׁמוּעָ֖ה <S%H8052><s%> a rumour וְשָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> and shall return לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> to his own land וְהִפַּלְתִּ֥יו <S%H5307><s%> and I will cause him to fall בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword בְּאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> in his own land

וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> returned רַב־ שָׁקֵ֔ה <S%H7262><s%> So Rabshakeh וַיִּמְצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> and found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria נִלְחָ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> warring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against לִבְנָ֑ה <S%H3841><s%> against Libnah כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> for he had heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> the king נָסַ֖ע <S%H5265><s%> that he was departed מִלָּכִֽישׁ׃ <S%H3923><s%> from Lachish

וַיִּשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> And when he heard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning תִּרְהָ֤קָה <S%H8640><s%> of Tirhakah מֶֽלֶך־ <S%H4428><s%> king כּוּשׁ֙ <S%H3568><s%> of Ethiopia לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> say הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> Behold he is come out לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> against וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> again וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> against thee he sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> unto Hezekiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמְר֗וּן <S%H559><s%> Thus shall ye speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִזְקִיָּ֤הוּ <S%H2396><s%> to Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יַשִּׁאֲךָ֣ <S%H5377><s%> deceive אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> Let not thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you בֹּטֵ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> in whom thou trustest בּ֖וֹ לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> thee saying לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תִנָּתֵן֙ <S%H5414><s%> shall not be delivered יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> Behold thou hast heard אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשׂ֜וּ <S%H6213><s%> have done מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> what the kings אַשּׁ֛וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָאֲרָצ֖וֹת <S%H776><s%> to all lands לְהַֽחֲרִימָ֑ם <S%H2763><s%> by destroying them utterly וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> and shalt תִּנָּצֵֽל׃ <S%H5337><s%> and shalt thou be delivered

הַהִצִּ֨ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> delivered אֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> Have the gods הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> of the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שִׁחֲת֣וּ <S%H7843><s%> have destroyed אֲבוֹתַ֔י <S%H1><s%> them which my fathers אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גּוֹזָ֖ן <S%H1470><s%> [as] Gozan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָרָ֑ן <S%H2771><s%> and Haran וְרֶ֥צֶף <S%H7530><s%> and Rezeph וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children עֶ֖דֶן <S%H5729><s%> of Eden אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּתְלַאשָּֽׂר׃ <S%H8515><s%> Telassar

אַיּ֤וֹ <S%H335><s%> Where מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Where [is] the king חֲמָת֙ <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king אַרְפָּ֔ד <S%H774><s%> of Arpad וּמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king לָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city סְפַרְוָ֑יִם <S%H5617><s%> of Sepharvaim הֵנַ֖ע <S%H2012><s%> of Hena וְעִוָּֽה׃ <S%H5755><s%> Ava

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> received חִזְקִיָּ֧הוּ <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסְּפָרִ֛ים <S%H5612><s%> the letter מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> of the hand הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <S%H4397><s%> of the messengers וַיִּקְרָאֵ֑ם <S%H7121><s%> and read וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> went up בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וַיִּפְרְשֵׂ֥הוּ <S%H6566><s%> and spread חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> it and Hezekiah לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> it before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God פ

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed חִזְקִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H2396><s%> And Hezekiah לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> and said יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwellest הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> [between] the cherubims אַתָּה־ <S%H859><s%> you ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> You הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> thou art the God לְבַדְּךָ֔ <S%H905><s%> alone לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> [even] thou alone of all the kingdoms הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You עָשִׂ֔יתָ <S%H6213><s%> thou hast made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and earth

הַטֵּ֨ה <S%H5186><s%> bow down יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> LORD אָזְנְךָ֙ <S%H241><s%> thine ear וּֽשֲׁמָ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear פְּקַ֧ח <S%H6491><s%> open יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes וּרְאֵ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> and see וּשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> the words סַנְחֵרִ֔יב <S%H5576><s%> of Sennacherib אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שְׁלָח֔וֹ <S%H7971><s%> which hath sent לְחָרֵ֖ף <S%H2778><s%> him to reproach אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> the living

אָמְנָ֖ם <S%H551><s%> Of a truth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD הֶחֱרִ֜יבוּ <S%H2717><s%> have destroyed מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> the kings אַשּׁ֛וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> and their lands

וְנָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> And have cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> their gods בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> into the fire כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> were not אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> for they [were] no gods הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but מַעֲשֵׂ֧ה <S%H4639><s%> but the work יְדֵֽי־ <S%H3027><s%> hands אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> of men's עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> wood וָאֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> and stone וַֽיְאַבְּדֽוּם׃ <S%H6><s%> therefore they have destroyed

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Now therefore O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נוּ <S%H3467><s%> I beseech thee save נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> pray מִיָּד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> thou us out of his hand וְיֵֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> may know כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> that all the kingdoms הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> that thou [art] the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H905><s%> you alone ס

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> sent יְשַֽׁעְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3470><s%> Then Isaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמ֔וֹץ <S%H531><s%> of Amoz אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2396><s%> to Hezekiah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> Because הִתְפַּלַּ֧לְתָּ <S%H6419><s%> [That] which thou hast prayed אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about סַנְחֵרִ֥ב <S%H5576><s%> to me against Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H8085><s%> I have heard

זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> against בָּזָ֨ה <S%H959><s%> hath despised לְךָ֜ לָעֲגָ֣ה <S%H3932><s%> thee [and] laughed thee to scorn לְךָ֗ בְּתוּלַת֙ <S%H1330><s%> concerning him The virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion אַחֲרֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H310><s%> at thee רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> her head הֵנִ֔יעָה <S%H5128><s%> hath shaken בַּ֖ת <S%H1323><s%> the daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Whom חֵרַ֙פְתָּ֙ <S%H2778><s%> Whom hast thou reproached וְגִדַּ֔פְתָּ <S%H1442><s%> and blasphemed וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> whom הֲרִימ֣וֹתָ <S%H7311><s%> ? and against whom hast thou exalted קּ֑וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [thy] voice וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up מָר֛וֹם <S%H4791><s%> and haughtily עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> [One] of Israel

בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> By מַלְאָכֶיךָ֮ <S%H4397><s%> thy messengers חֵרַ֣פְתָּ ׀ <S%H2778><s%> thou hast reproached אֲדֹנָי֒ <S%H136><s%> the Lord וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and hast said [בְּרֶכֶב כ] (בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7393><s%> chariots ק) רִכְבִּ֛י <S%H7393><s%> chariots אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I עָלִ֛יתִי <S%H5927><s%> I am come up מְר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> to the height הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <S%H3411><s%> to the sides לְבָנ֑וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon וְאֶכְרֹ֞ת <S%H3772><s%> and will cut down קוֹמַ֤ת <S%H6967><s%> the tall אֲרָזָיו֙ <S%H730><s%> cedar trees מִבְח֣וֹר <S%H4005><s%> choice בְּרֹשָׁ֔יו <S%H1265><s%> fir trees וְאָב֙וֹאָה֙ <S%H935><s%> thereof and I will enter מְל֣וֹן <S%H4411><s%> into the lodgings קִצֹּ֔ה <S%H7093><s%> of his borders יַ֖עַר <S%H3293><s%> [and into] the forest כַּרְמִלּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3759><s%> thickest

אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I קַ֔רְתִּי <S%H6979><s%> I have digged וְשָׁתִ֖יתִי <S%H8354><s%> and drunk מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters זָרִ֑ים <S%H2114><s%> strange וְאַחְרִב֙ <S%H2717><s%> have I dried בְּכַף־ <S%H3709><s%> and with the sole פְּעָמַ֔י <S%H6471><s%> of my feet כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All יְאֹרֵ֥י <S%H2975><s%> up all the rivers מָצֽוֹר׃ <S%H4693><s%> of besieged places

הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמַ֤עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> Hast thou not heard לְמֵֽרָחוֹק֙ <S%H7350><s%> long ago אֹתָ֣הּ <S%H853><s%> עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> [how] I have done לְמִ֥ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> times קֶ֖דֶם <S%H6924><s%> it [and] of ancient וִֽיצַרְתִּ֑יהָ <S%H3335><s%> that I have formed עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הֲבֵיאתִ֗יהָ <S%H935><s%> it? now have I brought וּתְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> should be to לַהְשׁ֛וֹת <S%H7582><s%> it to pass that thou shouldest be to lay waste גַּלִּ֥ים <S%H1530><s%> heaps נִצִּ֖ים <S%H5327><s%> [into] ruinous עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities בְּצֻרֽוֹת׃ <S%H1219><s%> fenced

וְיֹֽשְׁבֵיהֶן֙ <S%H3427><s%> Therefore their inhabitants קִצְרֵי־ <S%H7116><s%> were of small יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> power חַ֖תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> they were dismayed וַיֵּבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> and confounded הָי֞וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עֵ֤שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> they were [as] the grass שָׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> of the field וִ֣ירַק <S%H3419><s%> and [as] the green דֶּ֔שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> herb חֲצִ֣יר <S%H2682><s%> [as] the grass גַּגּ֔וֹת <S%H1406><s%> on the housetops וּשְׁדֵפָ֖ה <S%H7711><s%> and [as corn] blasted לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before קָמָֽה׃ <S%H7054><s%> it be grown up

וְשִׁבְתְּךָ֛ <S%H3427><s%> thy abode וְצֵאתְךָ֥ <S%H3318><s%> and thy going out וּבֹאֲךָ֖ <S%H935><s%> and thy coming in יָדָ֑עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> But I know וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הִֽתְרַגֶּזְךָ֥ <S%H7264><s%> and thy rage אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> against

יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because הִתְרַגֶּזְךָ֣ <S%H7264><s%> Because thy rage אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> against וְשַׁאֲנַנְךָ֖ <S%H7600><s%> against me and thy tumult עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> is come up בְאָזְנָ֑י <S%H241><s%> into mine ears וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <S%H7760><s%> therefore I will put חַחִ֜י <S%H2397><s%> my hook בְּאַפֶּ֗ךָ <S%H639><s%> in thy nose וּמִתְגִּי֙ <S%H4964><s%> and my bridle בִּשְׂפָתֶ֔יךָ <S%H8193><s%> in thy lips וַהֲשִׁ֣בֹתִ֔יךָ <S%H7725><s%> and I will turn thee back בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> by which thou camest בָּֽהּ׃

וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> this לְּךָ֣ הָא֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> And this [shall be] a sign אָכ֤וֹל <S%H398><s%> unto thee Ye shall eat הַשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> this year סָפִ֔יחַ <S%H5599><s%> such things as grow וּבַשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> of themselves and in the second סָחִ֑ישׁ <S%H7823><s%> that which springeth וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗ית <S%H7992><s%> of the same and in the third זִרְע֧וּ <S%H2232><s%> sow וְקִצְר֛וּ <S%H7114><s%> ye and reap וְנִטְע֥וּ <S%H5193><s%> and plant כְרָמִ֖ים <S%H3754><s%> vineyards וְאִכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> and eat פִרְיָֽם׃ <S%H6529><s%> the fruits

וְיָ֨סְפָ֜ה <S%H3254><s%> shall yet again פְּלֵיטַ֧ת <S%H6413><s%> that is escaped בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַנִּשְׁאָרָ֖ה <S%H7604><s%> And the remnant שֹׁ֣רֶשׁ <S%H8328><s%> take root לְמָ֑טָּה <S%H4295><s%> downward וְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and bear פְרִ֖י <S%H6529><s%> fruit לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> upward

וְגַנּוֹתִ֛י <S%H1598><s%> For I will defend אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> this city הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְהֽוֹשִׁיעָ֑הּ <S%H3467><s%> to save לְמַֽעֲנִ֔י <S%H4616><s%> sake וּלְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> David's עַבְדִּֽי׃ <S%H5650><s%> it for mine own sake and for my servant

וַיִּסַּ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> departed וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> along וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and returned סַנְחֵרִ֣יב <S%H5576><s%> So Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בְּנִֽינְוֵֽה׃ <S%H5210><s%> at Nineveh

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> came ה֨וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֜ה <S%H7812><s%> And it came to pass as he was worshipping בֵּ֣ית ׀ <S%H1004><s%> in the house נִסְרֹ֣ךְ <S%H5268><s%> of Nisroch אֱלֹהָ֗יו <S%H430><s%> his god וְֽאַדְרַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H152><s%> that Adrammelech וְשַׂרְאֶ֤צֶר <S%H8272><s%> and Sharezer (בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son ק) הִכֻּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> smote בַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> him with the sword וְהֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and they נִמְלְט֖וּ <S%H4422><s%> and they escaped אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲרָרָ֑ט <S%H780><s%> of Armenia וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אֵֽסַר־ חַדֹּ֥ן <S%H634><s%> And Esarhaddon בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his sons תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ
